SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT620
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged to confirm a Commodity fixed term loan/deposit contract.
The message is used to confirm/notify the details of:
a) a new contract between the parties
b) an amendment to a previously agreed contract
c) the cancellation of a confirmation
d) a rolled over/renewed contract between the parties
e) the maturity of a contract.
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, who have agreed to a Commodity fixed term loan/deposit contract.
A broker may also send this message to the two parties (party A and party B) for which he arranged the deal.
If there are two brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message can also be exchanged between these brokers.
Party A and party B are the legal entities which have agreed to the transaction.
Party A is either:
a) the Sender, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is sent, or
c) one of the institutions for which the broker arranged the deal and to whom it is sending the confirmation, or
d) when a broker confirms to another broker, the party for which the sending broker arranged the deal.
Party B is either:
a) the Receiver, or
b) the institution/corporate on behalf of which the message is received, or
c) the other institution for which the broker arranged the deal, ie, party A's counterparty, or
d) when a broker confirms to another broker, party A's counterparty.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 620 previously sent or to correct error(s) in an MT 620 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 620 previously sent or to cancel an MT 620 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: Used to send the MT 620 for the first time or to send a corrected MT 620 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 620 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: Confirmation is sent by a broker

Validation.Comment: Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T93) :

Code.Name: MATU
Code.Description: This is a confirmation of the liquidation of a fixed loan/deposit.

Code.Name: ROLL
Code.Description: This is a confirmation of a mutually agreed rollover/renewal with/without change in the principal amount and the interest to be settled or added/subtracted from that amount.

Validation.Comment: In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78). Note that optional codes are surrounded by square brackets ('[' and ']') which are not part of the syntax.

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

Allocation must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T03):
Type identifies the Commodity or coin. When identifying a Commodity , one of the following codes must be used (Error code(s): T04) :
Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67) :

Code.Name: B
Code.Description: Borrower: party A receives the principal amount and pays the interest.

Code.Name: L
Code.Description: Lender: party A pays the principal amount and receives the interest.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
In option F, Unit must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T06) :
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .

In option J, Unit must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T06) :
Sign must not be used when Rate is equal to '0' (Error code(s): T14) .

SwiftFieldDef.Description: Last Day of the First Interest Period

In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78). Note that optional codes are surrounded by square brackets ('[' and ']') which are not part of the syntax.

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78). Note that optional codes are surrounded by square brackets ('[' and ']') which are not part of the syntax.

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on the value of fields 22B and 22A (Error code(s): D70)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on the value of fields 22B and 22A"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 In sequence A, if field 94A is present and contains AGNT, then field 21N in sequence A is mandatory, otherwise field 21N is optional (Error code(s): D72)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 94A is present and contains AGNT, then field 21N in sequence A is mandatory, otherwise field 21N is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 In sequence B, the presence of fields 32H, 32R and 30X depends on the value of field 22B in sequence A (Error code(s): D56)
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "CONF", B.F32b.$size == 0 && B.F30X.$size > 0, If($value == "MATU", B.F32b.$size > 0 && B.F30X.$size == 0, B.F32b.$size > 0 && B.F30X.$size > 0))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the presence of fields 32H, 32R and 30X depends on the value of field 22B in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In sequence B, the values allowed for field 32H and 32R depend on the values of fields 22B in sequence A and 17R in sequence B (Error code(s): D57)
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies($value == "MATU", If(B.F17R.Indicator == "L", If(B.F32b.$size > 0 && IsNull(B[0].F32b[0].Sign), B[0].F32b[0].Amount == 0, B.F32b.$size > 0 && B[0].F32b[0].Amount > 0), B.F32b.$size > 0 && IsNull(B[0].F32b[0].Sign) && B[0].F32b[0].Amount >= 0))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, the values allowed for field 32H and 32R depend on the values of fields 22B in sequence A and 17R in sequence B"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 In sequence A, if field 22B contains MATU, then field 30F in sequence B is not allowed, otherwise field 30F is optional (Error code(s): D69)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 22B contains MATU, then field 30F in sequence B is not allowed, otherwise field 30F is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C6 In sequence B, if field 30F is present then field 38J in sequence B is mandatory, otherwise field 38J is not allowed (Error code(s): D60)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence B, if field 30F is present then field 38J in sequence B is mandatory, otherwise field 38J is not allowed"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence C if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence C if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence C is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence D if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence D is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence D is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence E if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence E is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence E if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence E is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C7-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence F if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence F is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional (Error code(s): E35)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence F if field 56a is not present, then field 86a in the same sequence F is not allowed, otherwise field 86a is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: C8 The presence of sequence H and the presence of fields 88a and 71F in sequence H, depend on the value of field 94A in sequence A (Error code(s): D74)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(A.F94A.$size == 0, Implies(H.$size > 0, H.F71F.$size == 0), If(In(A.F94A.Scope, "AGNT", "BILA"), Implies(H.$size > 0, H.F71F.$size == 0), H.$size > 0 && H.F88a.$size > 0))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The presence of sequence H and the presence of fields 88a and 71F in sequence H, depend on the value of field 94A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C9
fieldvalidation.comment: C9 If field 32H is present, then the currency code must be the same as the currency code in field 32B (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If field 32H is present, then the currency code must be the same as the currency code in field 32B"

fieldvalidation.name: C10
fieldvalidation.comment: C10 In sequence H, field 15H may not be the only field, ie, if field 15H is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence H must be present (Error code(s): C98).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence H, field 15H may not be the only field, ie, if field 15H is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence H must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C12-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C12-1 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 32a Currency and Principal Amount (Option F only) else, Unit must be GOZ (Error code(s): D07)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 32a Currency and Principal Amount (Option F only) else, Unit must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C12-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C12-2 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 32a Amount to be Settled (Option R only) else, Unit must be GOZ (Error code(s): D07)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 32a Amount to be Settled (Option R only) else, Unit must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C12-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C12-3 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 34a Currency and Interest Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must be GOZ (Error code(s): D07)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Mandatory Sequence B field 34a Currency and Interest Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C12-4
fieldvalidation.comment: C12-4 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Optional Sequence G Mandatory Subsequence G1 field 33a Transaction Currency and Net Interest Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must be GOZ (Error code(s): D07)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Optional Sequence G Mandatory Subsequence G1 field 33a Transaction Currency and Net Interest Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C12-5
fieldvalidation.comment: C12-5 When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Optional Sequence G Optional Subsequence G2 field 33a Reporting Currency and Tax Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must be GOZ (Error code(s): D07)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C, then the Unit GOZ and TOZ can not be used in Optional Sequence G Optional Subsequence G2 field 33a Reporting Currency and Tax Amount (Option J only) else, Unit must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: FH-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FH-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]](Error code(s): T32).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
